title: Personal Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience, built with React to practice modern web development concepts.

title: Food Ordering Web Application
description: A responsive food ordering platform that allows users to browse menus, add items to cart, and place orders online.

title: Project Biofuel Supply Chain
description: A web application for managing biofuel production and distribution from raw materials to end products, streamlining supply chain processes.

title: E-Commerce Web Application
description: An e-commerce application enabling users to view, search, and manage products with CRUD functionality and Spring Boot backend.

title: Hotel Management System
description: A C++ based system for managing hotel operations, including booking, check-ins, and check-outs, designed for efficient hotel management.

title: IPO WebApp & REST APIs Development
description: A Django based system for managing IPO's operations, including booking, Listing, and Allote, designed for efficient IPO management.
